values:
I...I lost. I lost a pun-off..to a dead lawyer girl.

Do: it was a FOOD theme! it shoulda been easy! people will rue the day "nacho cheese" is mentioned again..

..i shoulda called her a "dead beet" when i had the chance. *goes to emo some more*

dont worry guys ill be fine in a day, clowns dont stay sad.

hey guys! i guess you might have been wondering where i went, lets just say there was a little accident involving my computer and a unicycle..but i wont get into it :oD;; All you need to know is everythings fixed now and i'll try not to dissapear again XoD

ooh..theres more talk of Tachimi on TV... ooh i can't wait to find out more! :oD

OH! I just love valentines day! So much love and friendship and joy going all around! Mirika's told me that everyone is setting up little boxes for cards, how lovely! Ahayahya!

*puts down a large and incredibly colorful box covered in spots and carrots and all sorts of other things including a large smile pasted on the front*

((OOC: comments screened of course! gee I hope I'm doing this right))

Hey guys! :o) I finally decided to use this old computer here for something other than carrotsaplenty.com and the pun forums. I heard some of my circus friends were getting these "journal" things, so I thought I'd blog on and see if I'm the type of guy for this kinda thing! AHYAHYAHYA XoD!!! Well kids I better get back to juggling practice if I wanna be able to juggle 10 hoola hoops by thursday!
